title: Data Visualization

title: Random Variables
text: Here is some background on Random Variables.

title: The Binomial Distribution
text:
Here is some background on the binomial distribution.
Let \(X\) is distributed as a binomial random variable with parameters \(n\) and \(p\) if
\[
P(X = k) = \binom{n}{k} p^k (1-p)^{n-k}
\]

title: Conditional Probability
text:
Here is some background on conditional probability.
Bayes Rule allows you to invert a conditional probability. It states that
\[
P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A) \, P(A)}{P(B)}
\]

title: Office Hours
text:
Office Hours
You can embed Google Calendars via an iframe, which allows for easy collaborative updating of the calendar without republishing the website.
